info.title: org.quicko.qpon
info.description: Qpon is a coupon framework built by Quicko. Built in a scalable, multi-tenant thought process, the Qpon framework enables businesses to do campaigns and run offers using the Qpon API and dashboard.

parameters.name: external_id
parameters.description: filter to get organizations by external id

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional filter to get coupons by specified status

parameters.name: discount_type
parameters.description: Optional filter to get coupons by specified discount type

parameters.name: external_item_id
parameters.description: Optional filter to get coupons by specified item

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Optional filter to find coupon based on name

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional filter to get coupon sets by specified status

parameters.name: budgeted
parameters.description: Optional filter to get coupon sets with budget

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional filter to get coupon codes by specified status

parameters.name: visibility
parameters.description: Optional filter to get coupon codes as per specified visibility

parameters.name: external_id
parameters.description: Option filter to get customer specific coupon codes

parameters.name: duration_type
parameters.description: Optional filter to get coupon codes by specified duration type

parameters.name: x-accept-type
parameters.description: To get response in paginated list format

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optional filter to get coupon codes by specified status

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: Option filter to get customer specific coupon codes

parameters.name: external_customer_id
parameters.description: Optional filter to get customer specific coupon codes

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Optional filter to sort ascending or descending

parameters.name: external_id
parameters.description: Optional filter to get customer specific offer

parameters.name: coupon_id
parameters.description: Option filter to get redemptions for a coupon

parameters.name: campaign_id
parameters.description: Option filter to get redemptions for a campaign

parameters.name: coupon_code_id
parameters.description: Option filter to get redemptions for a coupon code

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Option filter to get redemptions redeemed from time in EPOCH

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Option filter to get redemptions redeemed to time in EPOCH
